description:
The job title is NLP engineer Remote, and the description is as follows: 

This is an opportunity for an NLP engineer to develop cutting-edge language models and deep learning models by collecting, preprocessing, and analyzing large-scale text corpora. The engineer will also be responsible for creating prototypes and proofs of concept in areas such as LLM, NLP, DL, ML, object detection/classification, and tracking. Skills used includes NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.. The skills required for the job are NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.
